The report of the 17th Congress comprehensively reviewed the historic changes in the image of the Chinese people, socialist China, and the Communist Party of China over the past 30 years of reform and opening up, and scientifically summarized the precious experience of our large country, with a population of more than one billion, in getting rid of poverty, accelerating modernization, and consolidating and developing socialism. The report pointed out that the fundamental reason for all our achievements and progress since the reform and opening up is that we have opened up the path of socialism with Chinese characteristics and formed the theoretical system of socialism with Chinese characteristics.

The path of socialism with Chinese characteristics is to uphold the leadership of the Communist Party of China, base ourselves on the fundamental national conditions, focus on economic construction, adhere to the four cardinal principles, adhere to reform and opening up, liberate and develop social productivity, consolidate and improve socialist system, build socialist market economy, socialist democratic politics, advanced socialist culture, and a harmonious socialist society, and build a prosperous, democratic, civilized and harmonious modern socialist country.

The theoretical system of socialism with Chinese characteristics includes major strategic thoughts such as Deng Xiaoping Theory, the important thought of "Three Represents", and the Scientific Development Concept.



The proposal of the new topic "Theoretical System of Socialism with Chinese Characteristics" is a scientific integration of our party's innovative theories in the new historical period of reform and opening up. It is also a scientific description of the openness of our party's theoretical achievements since the reform and opening up. It is a major theoretical contribution of the 17th National Congress and the latest result of the sinicization of Marxism. Over the past thirty years, in the great historical process of reform, opening up, and socialist modernization, our party has adhered to the emancipation of the mind, seeking truth from facts, keeping pace with the times, and constantly advancing the process of sinicization of Marxism with significant theoretical innovations, thus forming the theoretical system of socialism with Chinese characteristics.

Since the Third Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee, facing the precarious situation caused by ten years of the "Cultural Revolution", the Chinese Communists, represented mainly by Deng Xiaoping, with tremendous theoretical courage and political courage, scientifically evaluated Mao Zedong and Mao Zedong Thought. They thoroughly negated the erroneous theories and practices of "class struggle as the guiding principle," made a historical decision to focus on economic construction and carry out reform and opening up, ushered in a new period of socialist development, and gradually formed Deng Xiaoping Theory by continuing to accumulate experience and exploring theories on "what is socialism and how to build socialism."

Since the Fourth Plenary Session of the 13th Central Committee, the Chinese Communists, represented mainly by Jiang Zemin, have held high the great banner of Deng Xiaoping Theory, persisted in reform and opening up, kept pace with the times, successfully pushed forward the modernization cause of socialism with Chinese characteristics into the 21st century, and deepened the understanding of "what is socialism, how to build socialism" and "what kind of party to build, how to build the party" in the practice of building socialism with Chinese characteristics, forming the "three represents" important thinking, thus enriching and developing the theoretical system of socialism with Chinese characteristics.

Since the 16th National Congress, the Central Committee of the Party with Hu Jintao as the General Secretary, based on the basic national conditions of the primary stage of socialism and the new development requirements, drawing on our country's development experience and foreign development experience, has preliminarily answered "what kind of development we are striving to achieve and how to develop," among other major theoretical and practical issues, and proposed a series of strategic thoughts including the scientific development concept. The concept is an inheritance and development of the important development thoughts of the three generations of central leadership of the Party, a concentrated reflection of the Marxist worldview and methodology on development, a scientific theory that both inherits and keeps pace with Marxism-Leninism, Mao Zedong Thought, Deng Xiaoping Theory, and the important thought of "Three Represents". It is also a significant guiding principle for China's economic and social development, and a major strategic thought that must be adhered to and implemented in the development of socialism with Chinese characteristics.

Deng Xiaoping Theory and the "Three Represents" important thoughts were respectively written into the Party Constitution at the 15th and 16th National Congresses and established as the Party's guiding thoughts. The 17th National Congress unanimously agreed to write the concept of scientific development into the Party Constitution.

The theory of socialism with Chinese characteristics adheres to and develops Marxism-Leninism and Mao Zedong Thought, embodies the wisdom and hard work of several generations of Chinese Communists leading the people in their unremitting exploration, and is the latest result of the sinization of Marxism. It's the Party's most precious political and spiritual wealth and the common ideological foundation for the united struggle of all ethnic groups across the country. The theoretical system of socialism with Chinese characteristics is a continuously developing and open theoretical system. The practice of nearly 160 years since the publication of the Communist Manifesto has proved that Marxism can only bloom with strong vitality, creativity, and appeal when it is integrated with the national conditions of the host country, advances with the times, and shares destiny with the masses. In contemporary China, adhering to the theoretical system of socialism with Chinese characteristics is truly adhering to Marxism. 

2. The new requirements for comprehensively building a well-off society and the overall layout of the "four-pronged comprehensive" construction.

Adhering to the theoretical system of socialism with Chinese characteristics, from a practical perspective, means adapting to the new changes in domestic and international situations, meeting the new expectations of people of all ethnic groups for a better life, deeply implementing and striving to realize the new requirements of the goal of comprehensively building a well-off society proposed by the 17th National Congress of the Party.

1. The new requirements for the goal of comprehensively building a well-off society.



We have already taken solid strides towards the goal of building a well-off society in an all-round way as established by the 16th National Congress, and we should continue to strive hard to ensure that we achieve our goal of building a well-off society in all respects by 2020. To this end, the 17th National Congress of the Party has put forward the following new requirements:

(1) Enhance the coherence of development and strive to achieve both good and fast economic development. Significant progress has been made in transforming the structure of development, improving the benefits, reducing consumption, protecting the environment, and doubling the per capita gross domestic product by 2020 compared to 2000. The socialist market economy system has been further improved. Self-innovation ability has been significantly improved, and the growth rate of technological progress has significantly increased, ranking among innovative countries. The consumption rate of residents has steadily increased, forming a coordinated growth pattern driven by consumption, investment, and export. The mechanisms for coordinated and interactive development between urban and rural areas and a layout based on main functional areas have basically formed. Significant progress has been made in the construction of a new socialist countryside. The proportion of urban population has significantly increased.

(2) Expand socialist democracy and better protect people's rights and interests and social justice. The orderly expansion of citizen political participation. The basic strategy of ruling the country by law is being deeply implemented, the concept of the rule of law in the whole society has further strengthened, and new results have been achieved in the construction of a government by law. The grassroots democratic system has been improved. The government's ability to provide basic public services has been significantly enhanced.

(3) Strengthen the construction of culture, and significantly improve the cultural quality of the entire nation. The socialist core value system has deeply infiltrated people's hearts, and good ideological and moral trends have been further promoted. A public cultural service system that covers the entire society has been basically established, the cultural industry's share of the national economy has significantly increased, international competitiveness has significantly enhanced, and cultural products that meet the needs of the people are more abundant.

(4) Accelerate the development of social undertakings and improve the people’s livelihood comprehensively. A more complete modern national education system, a basic lifelong education system has been formed, and the level of public education and innovation talent training has been significantly improved. Employment is more sufficient. A social security system covering urban and rural residents has basically been established, and everyone enjoys basic living security.



A reasonably ordered income distribution pattern has formed, with the majority being middle-income earners, and absolute poverty has been essentially eliminated. Everyone enjoys basic medical and health services. The social management system has improved.
(5) Constructing an ecological civilization, basically forming an industrial structure, growth model, and consumption pattern that saves energy and protect the ecological environment. The circular economy has formed a large scale, and the proportion of renewable energy has significantly increased. The emission of major pollutants has been effectively controlled, and the quality of the ecological environment has significantly improved. Eco-civilization concepts are firmly established in the whole society.
By the time the goal of comprehensively building a well-off society is achieved in 2020, our ancient civilization, with its long history, and developing socialist country, will become a country that has fundamentally completed industrialization, significantly strengthened comprehensive national power, and ranks among the top in the world in terms of total domestic market size. It will become a country where people's wealth and quality of life have generally improved, the ecological environment is good, people enjoy more complete democratic rights, have higher cultural quality and spiritual pursuits, the institutional system is more perfect, society is more vibrant and stable and unified, and the country which is more open to the outside world, has more affinity, and contributes more to human civilization.
Implementing the above-mentioned new requirements for striving to fully build a well-off society, all party comrades must "fully grasp the scientific connotation and spiritual substance of the scientific development concept, enhance the consciousness and determination to implement the scientific development concept, strive to change thoughts and ideas that are not adapted or conform to the scientific development concept, strive to solve outstanding problems that affect and restrict scientific development, guide the development enthusiasm of the whole society to scientific development, and implement the scientific development concept in all aspects of economic and social development".
In-depth implementation of the new requirements for striving to fully build a well-off society, one of the most important tasks is to actively build a socialist harmonious society. This is because scientific development and social harmony are inherently unified. Without scientific development, there is no social harmony, and without social harmony, it is difficult to achieve scientific development. Therefore, the new demands of striving to fully build a well-off society must always focus on the construction of a socialist harmonious society.
2. Strive to build a socialist harmonious society
The construction of a socialist harmonious society is a major strategic decision made by our Party based on the basic principles of Marxism and the practical experience of our country's socialist construction, and according to the new demands of our country's economic and social development in the new century and the new stage, and the new trends and characteristics of our society. It is a significant achievement of our Party in guiding new social practice with developing Marxism.
(1) The proposal of the idea of building a socialist harmonious society
A socialist harmonious society is our Party's unremitting goal and the common social ideal of all ethnic groups in our country. After the founding of New China, we established the socialist system where the people are the masters, eliminated the institutional roots that lead to social opposition and social disharmony, and opened up a vast path for the construction of a harmonious society.



However, because understanding the laws governing socialist construction requires a process, we have made mistakes in our perception of what socialism is and how to build it, even leading to severe mistakes such as the Cultural Revolution which was comprehensive and lasted for a long time. After the third plenary session of the eleventh Central Committee of the Party, our party decisively abandoned the guideline of “taking class struggle as the guiding principle”, shifted the focus of the party and the country's work to socialist modernization, adhered to the principle of economic construction, persistently promoted reform and opening up, actively led economic development and comprehensive social progress, and forcefully promoted the building of a harmonious society.
For a long time, thanks to the joint efforts of our party and the Chinese people, our society has generally reached a harmonious state. However, there are also many contradictions and problems that affect social harmony, the main ones being: the imbalance among urban and rural areas, regions, economic and social developments, the increased pressure of population, resources, and environment; issues related to employment, social security, income distribution, education, health care, housing, industrial safety, and social order which closely interconnect with the people's interests are relatively prominent; the institutional mechanism is not yet perfect, and democracy and legality are not yet well developed. The lack of integrity and moral norm among some social members, the qualities, capabilities, and style of some leaders do not meet the requirements of the new situation and tasks; the corruption phenomenon in some areas is still quite serious; the infiltration and destruction activities of hostile forces endanger national security and social stability. The existence of these contradictions and problems shows that there are still difficult tasks in building a socialist harmonious society in China. Faced with this challenging historical task, the Party's sixteenth National Congress proposed "a harmonious society" as one of the goals for a society of overall well-being.
(2) Further systemization and theorization of the concept of a harmonious society
Since the sixteenth National Congress of the Party, our party's understanding of social harmony has deepened, and the position of a socialist harmonious society in the overall layout of the cause of socialism with Chinese characteristics has become increasingly clear.
In November 2002, the sixteenth Congress of the Party proposed the goal of building an overall well-off society with "six more", one of which is "more harmonious society". In September 2004, the resolution on strengthening the party's governance capacity adopted by the fourth plenary session of the 16th Central Committee of Communist Party of China proposed the proposition of constructing a harmonious society, making the enhancement of the capacity to build a harmonious society one of the main tasks of constructing the party's ruling capability.
On February 19, 2005, Hu Jintao initially outlined the basic characteristics of a socialist harmonious society at a workshop for principals of provincial and ministerial bodies focused on "improving the capacity to build a socialist harmonious society". He clearly pointed out that our socialist harmonious society should be one of democracy and rule of law, fairness and justice, trust and love, full of vitality, stable order, and harmonious coexistence of man and nature. Hu Jintao also stressed that the construction of a socialist harmonious society is organically integrated with the construction of material, political, and spiritual civilization in socialism. They have not only inseparable close connections, but also their special fields and laws.



Building a socialist material civilization, political civilization, and spiritual civilization can provide a solid foundation for constructing a socialist harmonious society; on the other hand, constructing a socialist harmonious society can also provide important conditions for building a socialist material civilization, political civilization, and spiritual civilization.
In October 2006, the Sixth Plenary Session of the 16th Central Committee of the Party made the "Decision on Some Major Issues Regarding the Construction of a Socialist Harmonious Society" (referred to as the "Decision"), which formed a programmatic document for constructing a socialist harmonious society. Starting from the importance and urgency of building a socialist harmonious society, the "Decision" first clarified the nature and positioning of the socialist harmonious society. The socialist harmonious society that we want to build is not the same as the "Great Harmony World" envisioned by some thinkers in our country's history, it is also different from the "Utopia" depicted by utopian socialists, but the product of the combination of Marxist thoughts on social harmony with contemporary China's reality. The "Decision" points out that the socialist harmonious society we want to build is a harmonious society co-constructed and jointly enjoyed by all the people under the leadership of the Chinese Communist Party on the road to socialism with Chinese characteristics. This clarifies the leadership core, development path, practical subject, and ultimate goal of the construction of the socialist harmonious society.

To construct a socialist harmonious society, correct guiding thoughts are necessary. The "Decision" emphasizes that it is necessary to adhere to Marxism-Leninism, Mao Zedong Thought, Deng Xiaoping Theory and the "Three Represents" important thought as the guide, adhere to the Party's basic line, basic program, basic experience, adhere to the scientific development view to command the overall situation of economic and social development, in accordance with the general requirements for democratic rule of law, fairness and justice, sincerity and love, vitality, stability and order, and harmonious coexistence between man and nature, focus on solving the most concerned, direct, and realistic interest problems of the people, and strive to develop social undertakings, promote social fairness and justice, construct a harmonious culture, improve social management, enhance social creativity, follow the path of common prosperity, and promote coordinated development of social construction with economic construction, political construction, cultural construction.

(3) Goals, main tasks, and basic principles of building a socialist harmonious society

In accordance with the goal of building a moderately prosperous society in all respects set by the 16th National Congress of the Party, based on the general requirements for building a socialist harmonious society, the "Decision" proposes the goals and main tasks for building a socialist harmonious society by 2020: the socialist democratic legal system is more perfect, the strategy of governing the country according to the law is fully implemented, and the rights and interests of the people are effectively respected and protected; the trend of widening gaps in urban and rural, regional development is gradually reversed, a reasonable and orderly income distribution pattern is basically formed, household wealth is generally increased, people live a wealthier life; employment is relatively full, a social security system covering urban and rural residents is basically established; the basic public service system is more complete, the level of government management and service has been greatly improved; the ideological, moral, scientific and cultural, and health qualities of the entire nation have significantly improved, good moral customs and harmonious interpersonal relationships have been further formed; the creative vitality of the whole society has significantly increased, the innovative country is basically built; the social management system is more perfect, social order is good; the efficiency of resource utilization has significantly improved, the ecological environment has significantly improved; to achieve the goal of building a higher-level moderately prosperous society benefiting billions of people, and strive to form a situation where all people can do their best, get their due, and live in harmony.

To build a socialist harmonious society, it is necessary to adhere to the correct principles. The plenary "Decision" puts forward the "Six Must Adheres" principles: ① Must adhere to putting people first; ② Must adhere to scientific development; ③ Must adhere to reform and opening up; ④ Must adhere to democratic rule of law; ⑤ Must adhere to properly handling the relationship between reform, development, and stability; ⑥ Must adhere to the joint construction of the entire society under the leadership of the party.

3. Preliminary clarification of the overall layout of socialist construction

The proposal of the strategic task of constructing a socialist harmonious society has made the overall layout of the cause of socialism with Chinese characteristics more clearly develop from a trinity of socialist economic construction, political construction, cultural construction to a four-in-one of socialist economic construction, political construction, cultural construction, and social construction.



From a comprehensive perspective, it is not difficult to find that: regarding the construction of socialist politics, it mainly involves solving the framework of the basic political form of socialism with Chinese characteristics, continuously improving the socialist political system, and gradually reflecting the scientificity, rationality, and effectiveness of political governance; concerning the construction of socialist economics, it primarily involves continuously building the basic economic system of socialism to address the issues of motivation and efficiency in socialist society development, thus establishing a solid material basis for the consolidation of socialism; regarding the construction of socialist culture, it is mainly about forming the core value theory of socialism and healthy humanistic concepts, building a scientific, advanced socialist ideological theory and social cultural atmosphere, to create a good humanistic environment for the better development of socialism. The construction of a harmonious socialist society aims to better solve the overall layout of socialist modernization, promote political development, economic development, and cultural development while emphasizing the resolution of social development and progress, a historical issue. The proposal of the development layout idea of "Four-in-one" has further enriched and developed the theory of socialism with Chinese characteristics from the perspectives of social motivation, social development, social progress, etc., and becomes an intrinsic component of the cause of socialism with Chinese characteristics, further clarifying the social value orientation and development goals of socialism, which not only innovates the balance mechanism of socialist society but also develops the power mechanism of socialist society. Therefore, the proposal of this concept not only highlights the tasks of social construction, makes the overall layout of our country's socialist modernization construction more reasonable, but also makes the development model of socialism with Chinese characteristics clearer. 
The strategic idea of building a harmonious socialist society is consistent with the basic principles of Marxism, fits the scientific conception of Marxist's socialist society and represents our Party's new progress in theory and practice of socialist society construction. This is both a summary of the Party's experience in governance and a reference to the governing experience and lessons of some foreign ruling parties; it deepens the understanding of the law of our country's socialist construction and deepens the understanding of the Communist Party’s ruling law, the law of socialist construction, and the law of human social development; it enriches and develops the theory of socialism with Chinese characteristics and enriches and develops the Marxist theory of socialist construction. 
Third, new deployments of deepening administrative system reform and rural reform 
From February 25 to 27, 2008, the second plenary session of the 17th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China was held in Beijing. The meeting examined and approved the "Opinions on Deepening the Reform of the Administrative Management System" and the "Plan for Reform of Government Institutions" proposed after extensive solicitation of opinions, and agreed to submit the "Plan for Reform of Government Institutions" to the first session of the 11th National People's Congress for deliberation. 
1. Opinions on Deepening the Reform of the Administrative Management System
The Central Committee of the Party and the State Council have always attached great importance to the reform of the administrative system. Since the reform and opening up, and especially since the 16th National Congress of the Party, we have continuously promoted the reform of the administrative system, strengthened the construction of the government itself, and achieved remarkable results. Overall, our country's administrative system basically meets the requirements of economic and social development and has strongly guaranteed the development of the reform and opening up and the cause of socialist modernization. Of course, to meet the new requirements of the administrative system in the face of the new situation and new tasks, the current administrative system still has some unsuitable aspects: the transformation of government functions is not in place, there is too much intervention in the microeconomic operation, and social management and public services are relatively weak; the overlapping of responsibilities among departments, disconnection of rights and responsibilities, and inefficiency are still prominent; the government agency setup still has scope for improvement, the administrative operation and management system is not sound enough; the supervision and restriction mechanism on administrative power is not perfect, and the misuse of power for private gains, corruption, and other issues still exist. These problems directly affect the government's comprehensive and proper performance of its duties, restricting economic and social development to a certain extent. Deepening the reform of the administrative system is imperative.  
(1) The goal of deepening administrative system reform. As for the overall goal of deepening administrative system reform, the "Opinions on Deepening the Reform of the Administrative Management System" clearly stated: to establish a relatively complete socialist administrative management system with Chinese characteristics by 2020.



Through reform, we aim to fundamentally shift the functions of government towards creating a favorable developmental environment, providing high-quality public services, and maintaining social fairness and justice. We aim to fundamentally transform the organization and personnel structure of the government in a scientific, standardized, and legal way. We aim to transform fundamentally the administrative operation mechanism and government management in a standardized, open, transparent, convenient, and efficient manner, to build a government that satisfies the people.
(2) The core of deepening administrative management system reform is to expedite the transformation of government functions. Functions of government departments should be clearly demarcated, responsibilities specified, and rights and duties made consistent. We should streamline the division of responsibilities among departments, upholding the principle that one department should be in charge of one issue. For issues requiring multi-departmental management, we must clarify the leading department and distinguish primary and secondary responsibilities. We must improve the coordination mechanisms between departments. We must decisively accelerate the process of separating government from enterprises, assets, affairs, and intermediary organizations in the market, transfer issues that should not be managed by the government, and effectively manage issues that should be managed by the government, to better utilize the role of the market in resource allocation and citizens and social organizations in public affairs management, and to more effectively provide public goods.
(3) Exploring the big department system and improving the administrative operating mechanism. The reform of government institutions primarily involves streamlining and unifying the structure according to the principles of decision-making, implementation, and supervision, focusing on functional transformation and smoothing the relationship of responsibilities to further optimize the government's organizational structure, standardize institutional arrangements, explore an organic unified system of large departments, and improve the administrative operating mechanism.
(4) Enhancing administrative law enforcement and institutional construction. Strictly enforce the law in administration and insist on managing power, affairs, and people with regulations. Improve the supervision mechanism, reinforce accountability, and ensure that power is exercised responsibly, with oversight, and breaches of the law are pursued. Further accelerate the building of a rule of law government; implement government performance management and administrative accountability system; improve administrative power supervision system; strengthen the construction of civil servant teams.
2. State Council Institutional Reform Plan
According to the spirit of the 17th National Congress of the Party and the second plenary session of the 17th Central Committee, the main task of this institutional reform of the State Council is to focus on transforming government functions and streamlining departmental responsibilities, to explore an organic unified system of large departments, to reasonably allocate the functions of macro-control departments, to strengthen energy and environmental management organizations, to integrate and improve the industrial and information, transportation industry management system, focusing on improving people's livelihood, and strengthen and integrate social management and public service departments.
(1) Reasonably allocating functions of macro-control departments. The National Development and Reform Commission should further transform its functions, reduce micro-management affairs and specific approval items, and focus on macro-control. The Ministry of Finance should reform and improve budget and taxation management, improve the system where central and local finances match their responsibilities, and improve the public finance system. The People's Bank of China should further improve the monetary policy system, strengthen the coordination with financial regulatory departments, and protect national financial security. The National Development and Reform Commission, the Ministry of Finance, the People's Bank of China and other departments should establish and improve a coordination mechanism, forming a more perfect macro-control system.
(2) Strengthening energy management institutions...



Establish a high-level decision-making coordination body, the National Energy Commission. The National Energy Administration is set up and managed by the National Development and Reform Commission. The responsibilities and organizations related to the energy industry management of the National Development and Reform Commission, the responsibilities of the office of the National Energy Leadership Group, and the nuclear power management responsibilities of the National Defense Science and Technology Industry Commission are integrated and incorporated into the Administration. The work of the office of the National Energy Commission is to be undertaken by the National Energy Administration. The National Energy Leadership Group and its office will no longer be retained.

(3) Establish the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology. The responsibilities related to the industrial industry management of the National Development and Reform Commission, the duties other than nuclear power management of the National Defense Science and Technology Industry Commission, the responsibilities of the Ministry of Information Industry and the Office of Informatization of the State Council are integrated and transferred to the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology. The National Defense Science and Technology Industry Bureau is established and managed by the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology. The State Tobacco Monopoly Administration will be managed by the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology. The National Defense Science and Technology Industry Commission, the Ministry of Information Industry, and the Office of the State Council Informatization are no longer retained.

(4) Establish the Ministry of Transport. The responsibilities of the Ministry of Transport, the Civil Aviation Administration of China, and the urban passenger transport guiding duties of the Ministry of Construction are consolidated and incorporated into the Ministry of Transport. The National Civil Aviation Administration is established and managed by the Ministry of Transport. The State Post Bureau will be managed by the Ministry of Transport. The Ministry of Railways will be retained and reform will continue. The Ministry of Transport and the Civil Aviation Administration of China will no longer be retained.

(5) Establish the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security. The responsibilities of the Ministry of Personnel and the Ministry of Labor and Social Security are integrated and incorporated into the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security. The National Civil Servant Bureau is set up and managed by the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security. The Ministry of Personnel and the Ministry of Labor and Social Security are no longer retained.

(6) Establish the Ministry of Environmental Protection.



The State Environmental Protection Administration will no longer be retained.
(7) Establishment of the Ministry of Housing and Urban-Rural Development. The Ministry of Construction is no longer retained.
(8) The State Food and Drug Administration will be managed by the Ministry of Health. The Ministry of Health is clearly responsible for the comprehensive coordination of food safety and the organization of serious food safety incidents.
3. Five Major Changes in Administrative Management System
The reform of China's administrative management system, as an important part of the national reform, will show five aspects of changes.
Firstly, the management philosophy of the government is changing, and the administrative basis is moving towards science. It further transforms from the management concept of planned economy to that of socialist market economy. The change in philosophy is specifically manifested in: the change in the idea that the state-owned economy is the only form and essence of socialism, and the government turns from serving the state-owned economy to serving all economic components conducive to the development of productivity; the change in the idea that development is economic development, and the government devotes itself to grasping economic growth towards improving the quality and efficiency of the economy and the comprehensive coordinated development of the economy and society. This change has promoted a series of adjustments and reforms in the system and policies.
Secondly, the management scope has changed, and government functions are becoming more reasonable. Through the separation of government and enterprises, the reform of the state-owned assets management system, and the adjustment of the state-owned economy layout, the government has transformed from overall management to mainly engaged in economic regulation, market supervision, social management and public services; from direct participation and intervention in economic activities to effective macro-control, creating a market environment; from simply pursuing high-speed economic growth to promoting the integration of economic speed, quality, structure and benefits, and promoting the coordinated development of society and economy, and harmony between man and nature.
Thirdly, the administrative method has changed, and management means are constantly improving. The reform of the administrative approval system is promoted. The approval items of the central and provincial governments have been significantly reduced, new approval methods such as approval and registration for record-keeping are adopted, the approval process is standardized and simplified, and "one-stop" approval services and online approvals are provided.



Fourth, the administrative base has changed and government behavior has become more standardized. Since the reform and opening up, six sequential government organization reforms of varying intensity have taken place. These have reinforced the agencies involved in economic regulation and supervision, and social management services. They have reduced the overlapping responsibilities between departments, streamlined the number of government workers, and promoted the transformation of government functions and the enhancement of efficiency.

Fifth, the quality of the cadres has changed and administrative capabilities have effectively improved. A stringent selection mechanism for administrative staff or civil servants has been established, requiring all staff entering state administrative agencies to pass an examination. A scientifically sound selection and appointment mechanism for leadership cadres has been introduced, implementing public selection, competitive posts and other systems. The 2005 Civil Service Law of the People's Republic of China has become an important indicator of the civil service team's construction and management moving towards legalization.

4. Arrangements for Deepening Rural Reform

From October 9 to 12, 2008, the Third Plenary Session of the Seventeenth Central Committee of the Communist Party of China was held in Beijing. The plenary session made comprehensive arrangements for further deepening rural reforms on the new tasks proposed by the Seventeenth National Congress to achieve the goal of a comprehensive moderate prosperity society.

(1) The objectives and tasks of deepening rural reform. According to the new tasks proposed by the 17th National Congress to achieve the goal of a comprehensive moderately prosperous society and the requirements for the construction of a socialist new countryside with productive development, affluent living standards, civilized folk customs, neat village environment, and democratic management, the basic objective and task of rural reform and development by 2020 will be: A more robust rural economic system; a broadly established system for integrated urban and rural economic and social development; significant progress in modern agricultural construction, a noticeable increase in agricultural comprehensive production capability, effective ensuring of national food security and the supply of major agricultural products; doubling the per capita net income of farmers from 2008; substantial improvement in consumption level; basic eradication of absolute poverty; further strengthening of rural grassroots organisation construction; perfecting of the villagers' autonomy system, and real safeguarding of farmers' democratic rights; significant progress in the equalisation of basic public services in urban and rural areas; burgeoning rural culture; better implementation of the basic cultural rights and interests of farmers. Everyone in the rural areas has the opportunity to receive a good education; a more robust system of basic life security and basic medical and health system in rural areas; a further improvement of the rural social management system. A fundamental formation of resource-saving and environmentally friendly agricultural production system; noticeable improvement in rural living and ecological environment; continuous enhancement of sustainable development capacity.

(2) Major principles to be followed in deepening rural reform. To achieve the basic objectives and tasks of rural reform and development by 2020, the following major principles must be adhered to.

Firstly, we must consolidate and strengthen the basic position of agriculture and always regard solving the food problems of billions of people as the top priority for governing and ensuring the nation's wellbeing.



Insist on the policy of achieving basic food self-sufficiency based on domestic conditions, increase national support and protection for agriculture, deeply implement the strategy of revitalizing agriculture through science and education, accelerate the construction of modern agriculture, realize the stable development of agriculture in all aspects, and lay a solid foundation for promoting economic development, promoting social harmony, and safeguarding national security.
Secondly, it is necessary to genuinely safeguard the rights and interests of farmers, and always take the realization, maintenance, and development of the fundamental interests of the majority of farmers as the starting point and landing point of all work in rural areas. Adhere to the people-oriented principle, respect the will of farmers, focus on solving the most concerned, most direct, and most realistic interest issues of farmers, protect the political, economic, cultural, and social rights and interests of farmers, improve the comprehensive quality of farmers, promote the all-round development of farmers, fully tap the subject role and pioneering spirit of farmers, and rely heavily on millions of farmers to build a new socialist countryside.
Thirdly, it is necessary to continuously liberate and develop the productive forces in rural areas, and always take reform and innovation as the fundamental motivation for rural development. Persistently promote rural reform and system innovation, improve the scientific nature of reform decision-making, enhance the coordination of reform measures, give full play to the fundamental role of the market in resource allocation, strengthen and improve the national regulation and guidance of agricultural and rural development, improve the rural economic system that is in line with the requirements of the socialist market economy, adjust the production relations and superstructure that are not suitable for the development requirements of the rural social productive forces, and make the rural economic and social development full of vitality.
Fourthly, it is necessary to coordinate urban and rural economic and social development, and always focus on building a new relationship between workers and farmers and urban and rural areas as a major strategy for accelerating modernization. Coordinate the construction of industrialization, urbanization, and agricultural modernization, accelerate the establishment of a long-term mechanism for promoting agriculture by industries and driving rural areas by cities, adjust the distribution pattern of national income, consolidate and improve policies to strengthen agriculture and benefit farmers, focus national infrastructure construction and social services to rural areas, promote the equalization of basic public services in urban and rural areas, achieve coordinated development in urban and rural areas and regions, and enable the vast majority of farmers to participate in the modernization process and share the achievements of reform and development equally.
Fifthly, it is necessary to insist on the Party's management of rural work and always take strengthening and improving the Party's leadership over rural work as the political guarantee for promoting rural reform and development. Insist on starting from reality, adhere to the party's basic policy in rural areas, strengthen the construction of rural grass-roots organizations and grass-roots governance, perfect the system and methods of the Party's management of rural work, maintain the ties between the Party and the masses of farmers, strengthen the ruling foundation of the Party in rural areas, and form a strong joint force to promote rural reform and development.
(3) Making a comprehensive deployment of the construction and innovation of rural systems. The construction of systems has fundamental, overall, and long-term significance. The plenary session accurately grasped the basic national conditions and phased characteristics of the current development of the initial stage of socialism in our country, closely revolved around the major issues in the current rural reform and development, grasped the important areas and key links of rural system reform, and deployed six major system constructions, namely, stabilizing and improving the basic operation system in rural areas; improving the strict and standardized rural land management system; improving the agricultural support and protection system; establishing a modern rural financial system; establishing a system to promote the integration of urban and rural economic and social development; and improving the rural democratic management system.



The third plenary session of the 17th Central Committee of the Party outlined the goals, tasks, and key principles for deepening rural reform and development, system construction, as well as actively promoted modern agriculture and improved comprehensive agricultural production capabilities. The meeting also accelerated the development of rural public utilities, promoted the overall progress of rural society, enhanced and improved the Party's leadership, and provided robust political assurance for promoting rural reform and development. This series of new deployments provides an overall approach to further deepening rural reforms, representing pivotal strategic steps towards realizing rural development objectives and advancing modern agriculture unique to China. Accelerating the construction of a new socialist countryside and vigorously promoting the integrated development of urban and rural areas bear significant and far-reaching significance.

4. Summary of 30 Years of Reform and Opening Up and Thorough Implementation of the Scientific Development Outlook

At a time when the Chinese Communist Party Central Committee led by General Secretary Hu Jintao is leading the entire party and people in the struggle to build a moderately prosperous society, China celebrates the 30th anniversary of its reform and opening up. In the past 30 years, driven by reform and opening up, the Party has blazed a trail of socialism unique to China based on what was achieved in 29 years since the founding of New China, achieving globally recognized accomplishments.

On December 18, 2008, on behalf of the Party Central Committee, Hu Jintao scientifically summarized the achievements and basic experiences garnered over 30 years of reform and opening up. These achievements include: vigorously promoting systemic reform, successfully transitioning from a highly centralized planned economy to a vibrant socialist market economy; continually expanding our openness to foreign countries, and accomplishing a historic transition from closed and semi-closed to all-around openness; focusing on economic construction, elevating our overall national strength; focusing on ensuring and improving people's livelihoods, and generally achieving a moderately well-off level of life; fervently developing socialist democracy, which has better safeguarded the people's right to be the masters of their own affairs; energetically developing advanced socialist culture, further satisfying the ever-growing cultural needs of the people; vigorously developing social undertakings, consolidating and promoting social harmony and stability; adhering to the Party's absolute leadership over the army, making major achievements in national defense and army building; successfully implementing the basic principle of "one country, two systems", taking significant steps towards the peaceful reunification of the motherland; adhering to the peaceful foreign policy of independence and self-reliance, achieving major achievements in all-around diplomacy; insisting that the Party supervises its actions and governs strictly, the Party's leadership level and governing ability, resistance to corruption and risk resistance ability have greatly improved.

The experience of the past 30 years has fully demonstrated that through accommodating the baptism of the great revolution of reform and opening-up, the Chinese nation has caught up with the tide of the times, socialist China stands tall in the East of the world, and the Communist Party of China stands at the forefront of the times.

In the 30 years of reform, our country has been able to achieve such brilliant results and historic progress primarily due to the combination of the basic principles of Marxism with the specific reality of China, blazing our own trail, and building socialism with Chinese characteristics. During these 30 years of reform and opening up, through our hard exploration, we have accumulated valuable experience. This is clarified by the "Ten Combinations" stated by the 17th National Congress of the Party, namely:

The first is to combine the adherence to the basic principles of Marxism with the advancement of the sinicization of Marxism, both adhering to the basic principles of Marxism and constantly advancing the sinicization of Marxism in line with contemporary Chinese practices and the development of times, enabling Marxism to better guide the practice of developing socialism with Chinese characteristics and imbuing contemporary Chinese Marxism with vigor.



Second is to integrate adhering to the four basic principles with persisting in reform and opening up. The four basic principles ensure the right direction of reform and opening up, while also enriching them with new meanings in the current era through reform and opening up. We educate and guide the entire party and all the people across the nation to profoundly comprehend the dialectic relationship and significant meaning of adhering to the four basic principles and persisting in reform and opening up. We insist on uniting economic construction as the core along with the two pivotal points of sticking to the four basic principles and persisting in reform and opening up in the practice of developing socialism with Chinese characteristics.

Third is to combine respect for the pioneering spirit of the people with the strengthening and bettering of party leadership. We adhere to the scientific Marxist principle that it is the people who create history, genuinely representing the fundamental interests of the most extensive Chinese people, relying closely on the people, and broadly mobilize the enthusiasm, initiative, and creativity of the people. We garner strength and wisdom from the people and constantly strengthen and improve party leadership, ensuring that the party receives the people's full trust and support and always plays the core leading role.

Fourth is to combine insistence on the basic system of socialism with the development of a market economy. In the midst of deep and extensive reform, we persist in the basic system of socialism while also developing a market economy under socialist conditions, guiding economic activities to follow the requirements of value laws, constantly liberating and developing the productive forces of society, enhancing comprehensive national strength, improving the standard of living of the people, and better realizing the central task of economic construction.

Fifth is to combine advancing the economic base's transformation with promoting the reform of superstructure. We vigorously promote economic system reform and political system reform, develop socialist democracy, build a socialist country ruled by law, ensure that the people are the masters, and continuously push the superstructure of our country's socialism to adapt to the economic base, providing institutional guarantees and legal protection for reform and opening up and socialist modernization.

Sixth is to combine the development of social productivity with the improvement of the whole nation's civilization level. We emphasize both the development of material beings, i.e., the development of social productivity, and the development of humans, i.e., the improvement of the whole nation's civilization level. We insist on both material civilization and spiritual civilization, vigorously developing socialist culture, building a socialist spiritual civilization, striving to cultivate citizens with ideals, morals, culture, and discipline, providing strong spiritual motivation and intellectual support for economic and social development.

Seventh is to integrate improving efficiency with promoting social fairness. We highly value promoting development through efficiency enhancement and promoting social harmony through realizing social fairness based on economic development. We insist on a people-oriented approach, focusing on solving the most relevant, direct, and realistic interest issues of the people, striving to develop social undertakings, striving to perfect income distribution systems, safeguarding and improving people's livelihood, pursuing the path of common prosperity, and striving to create a situation where everyone does their best, gets their due, and lives harmoniously.

Eighth is to integrate upholding independence with participating in economic globalization. We highly cherish and steadfastly maintain the independence and autonomy of the Chinese people, which has been achieved through long-term struggle, while we also stick to the basic national policy of opening up to the outside world. We consistently scrutinize the development of China and the world from the perspective of the connection between international affairs and domestic affairs, think and formulate China's development strategy, adhere to an independent foreign policy of peace, adhere to the path of peaceful development, adhere to a win-win strategy of opening-up, and promote the construction of a harmonious world of enduring peace and common prosperity.

Ninth is to combine promoting reform and development with maintaining social stability. While vigorously promoting reform and development, we correctly deal with the relationship among reform, development, and stability. We insist that reform is the driving force, development is the goal and stability is the premise. We insist on reconciling the intensity of reform, the pace of development, and the degree to which society can bear them. We regard consistently improving people's livelihood as the important nexus for dealing with the relationships among reform, development, and stability. We promote reform and development in social stability and promote social stability through reform and development.



The "tenth combination" promotes the great cause of Socialism with Chinese Characteristics and advances the new great construction of the Party, both advancing the construction of the Party around the aim of Socialism with Chinese Characteristics and progressing Socialism with Chinese Characteristics through strengthening and improving the construction of the Party, constantly improving the Party's ruling capacity, maintaining and developing the Party's vanguard nature, consistently enhancing the Party's class basis and expanding its mass base, continuously improving its ability to prevent corruption and resist risks, thus ensuring the Party always remains the strong leading core of the cause of Socialism with Chinese Characteristics.

These "ten combinations" are a new summary enriched with the spirit of the times. In summary, they creatively explore and answer major theoretical and practical questions such as: What is Marxism? How to treat Marxism? What is socialism? How to build socialism? What kind of party should be built? How to build the party? What kind of development should be achieved? How to develop, etc. One of the important characteristics is that it reflects the concept of the "combination" during the second historical leap, which is a specific exposition of the general requirement of combining the basic principles of Marxism with contemporary China's practice and characteristics of the times. The "ten combinations" are precious experiences of poverty alleviation, accelerating modernization, consolidating and developing socialism by our country with a population of more than one billion, and they are also extremely valuable spiritual wealth obtained after long-term practice and hard exploration by the Party and the people. Hu Jintao's historic summary of 30 years of reform and opening up is building on previous achievements, with profound thoughts, rich connotations, strong theoretical, strategic and guiding significance. It shines with the light of Marxist truth throughout, further enriching the theoretical system of Socialism with Chinese characteristics is the programmatic document guiding our country to continue to push forward the great cause of reform and opening up.

By drawing from and continuing to apply these precious experiences, constantly enriching and developing them in the practice of building Socialism with Chinese Characteristics, sticking to the principles of liberation of thinking, seeking truth from facts, keeping pace with the times, having the courage to reform, having the courage to innovate, never becoming rigid, never stagnating, not being afraid of any risks, not being confused by any interference, the development and innovation of the Chinese Communist Party's guiding ideology will achieve greater success. 

Summarizing the historical experiences of the Communist Party of China in governing the country and in carrying out reforms and opening up, has enabled the Communist Party of China to take a big step forward in the path of sinicization of Marxism. In turn, the new development of sinicization of Marxism boosts the Communist Party of China to constantly form new understandings of the laws of reform, opening up, and socialist modernization construction of our country.

The new understanding comes from new practice. During the "Eleventh Five-Year Plan" period, faced with a complex domestic and foreign situation and a series of major risks and challenges, the Communist Party of China united and led the people of all ethnic groups in the country to push forward reform and opening up and socialist modernization construction, and the country historic changes took place in the outlook. Our country's social productivity, comprehensive national strength have significantly improved, various social undertakings have accelerated their development, people's lives have significantly improved, great progress has been made in reform and opening up, and the international status and influence have significantly improved. Manned space flight, lunar exploration projects, the development of supercomputers and other cutting-edge technologies have achieved major breakthroughs, and significant achievements have been made in the modernization of national defense and the armed forces. Especially, these accomplishments were made under the difficult conditions of frequent natural disasters such as the impact of the international financial crisis, the massive earthquakes in Wenchuan and Yushui, and the deadly mudslide in Zhouqu.



Based on the summarization of the achievements and experiences, in October 2010, The Fifth Plenary Session of the 17th Communist Party of China passed the "Proposals for Formulating the 12th Five-Year Plan for National Economic and Social Development," explicitly proposing that the guiding ideology for the formulation of the "Twelfth Five-Year" Plan is: holding high the great banner of socialism with Chinese characteristics, guided by Deng Xiaoping Theory and the "Three Represents." The implementation of the scientific development concept adapts to new changes in domestic and international situations, catering to new expectations of people of all ethnic groups for a better life. The plan focuses on deepening reform and opening up, guaranteeing and improving people's livelihood, and consolidating and expanding the achievements in response to the impact of the international financial crisis. In turn, this promotes long-term, sustained, and rapid economic development and social harmony and stability, laying a decisive foundation for building a moderately prosperous society in all respects. 

In March 2011, The 4th Session of the 11th National People's Congress reviewed and approved the "Outline of the 12th Five-Year Plan for National Economic and Social Development of the People's Republic of China." The "Twelfth Five-Year" Plan outline approved by the Congress, firmly rooted in socialism with Chinese characteristics and guided by Deng Xiaoping Theory and the "Three Represents," deeply implements the concept of scientific development, adheres to the strategic economic structure adjustment as the main direction for accelerating the transformation of the economic development mode, maintains the improvement of people's livelihood as the fundamental starting point and landing point for accelerating the transformation of economic development, stresses constructing resources-saving and environmentally friendly society as a key point to accelerate the change of economic development mode, and insists on reform and opening up as a powerful force for accelerating the transformation of economic development. The outline clearly defines the main goals of China's economic and social development during the "Twelfth Five-Year" period and outlines a development blueprint for the next five years. The outline also specifically identifies the main goals of China's economic and social development for the following five years. These goals not only organically combine the five-year and ten-year perspectives, as well as the current and long-term, but also closely link with the struggle goals of comprehensively building a moderately prosperous society, comprehensively considering future development trends and conditions.

Looking at the "Twelfth Five-Year" Plan, the magnificent blueprint is inspiring, and the grand goal motivates people to forge ahead. The action program formulated by the central government, with a practical and inspiring touch, clearly outlines the action roadmap for the third Five-Year in the new century, showing the direction for China's future development and filling the people of all ethnic groups with hope for the future of socialist China.
